amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that funding provided by CARA is intended to supplement, and not detract from, annual appropriations for the National Park Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 106-612 to clarify that funding provided by CARA is intended to supplement annual appropriations for the National Park Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
